wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Paul Duffield (born 20 May 1952) is the former Town Clerk of London and Chief Executive of the Corporation of the City of London. He was succeeded by John Barradell in 2012.

response: * Chris Duffield (b. 1952), Town Clerk and Chief Executive of the Corporation of the City of London since 2003
* Chris Duffield - Town Clerk and Chief Executive of the City of London Corporation

John Barradell  is the Town Clerk of London and Chief Executive of the Corporation of the City of London. He was appointed in 2015, when he succeeded Chris Duffield; he was the only candidate considered for the position.
